Articles.Content: X Plane 11 is on special on Steam at the moment.  Anyone here tried it and able to comment on its fun vs realism level?  I'm not interested in having to go through 30 step checklists just to start the engine, but would like a reasonably realistic flying experience.  Specifically has anyone tried it on an Oculus Rift?  I've found some Steam games can be a bit flaky on the Oculus.
